name: Hope Demo
description:
Alone you wake up amnesiac, trying to uncover your past by exploring the world.

Hope is a point-and-click adventure game where you will seek out many items to combine and use them to solve puzzles.

The demo contains the first part of the game.
The trailer and the screenshots correspond to the full version of the game.
The game will be available in August 2020.

If you liked the demo, don't forget to add the game to your wishlist!
